abstract: Stan Wawrinka defeats Marcos Baghdatis to win Dubai Tennis Championships in United Arab Emirates; other tennis scores noted.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Tops Baghdatis in Dubai Final
headline.main: Stan Wawrinka Tops Marcos Baghdatis in Dubai Final

snippet: Wawrinka defeated Baghdatis, 6-4, 7-6 (13), in a battle of 30-year-olds to win the Dubai Tennis Championships in the United Arab Emirates on Saturday.
lead_paragraph: Wawrinka defeated Baghdatis, 6-4, 7-6 (13), in a battle of 30-year-olds to win the Dubai Tennis Championships in the United Arab Emirates on Saturday.
